column3:
In my opinion this is not really an improvement, the new one has too much space between the frames, which also looks weird.

Maybe reduce the space between label and amount but keep the frame the same width so it's still half/half.

BTW: you can include images into github posts directly, no need to use imageshack links

I tried what you suggested. Its ok, but I like this one better, what do you think?

![overviewfix_fixed2](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2814559/1892442/c8cb1a8c-7a51-11e3-9dcc-08537781cd54.png)

Seems unbalanced. And now we have the same problem that you report but in the right column .

I haven't mastered the art of showing only little information on a page without it seeming empty either, but these kind of incremental changes don't improve it in my eyes. Overview page needs a radical redesign, maybe for 1.0.

Yes I agree, I think this is mostly a question of what you are used to. And if it looks different
you first thought is "this looks weird". Updated the pull req again. It looks very similar to what we had in 0.8 now.

![overviewfix_fixed3](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2814559/1894223/2a951510-7ad9-11e3-832c-0b0f25ea2e66.png)
